tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE news_data (
    news_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    news_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    news_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    publish_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    sentiment_score REAL
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    headline TEXT,
    body TEXT,
    published_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    buy_threshold FLOAT,
    sell_threshold FLOAT,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sentiments (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    news_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (news_id) REFERENCES financial_news(news_id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    result_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES trading_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    news_id INT,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    market_price FLOAT,
    news_published_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (news_id) REFERENCES financial_news(news_id)
);
